name: A.I (Alpha 3)
description:
A Super Human Robot Platformer

-----------------------------------------------

A.I  is a game in which you play as a super human robot trying to test your limits in a parkour coarse made by your creators

CONTROLS:

WASD - Basic Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Run

Run + Jump Near Wall - Wall Run

Ctrl - Slide

------------------------------------------------------

Change Notes:

- More Levels

- Added Bill Boards

- Updated Storage Room

- Removed Multiple Stacks of Cubes

- Added Robot Head in Storage Room
